attributes.action: allow pensioners monthly vouchers for one tank of fuel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister,
While we already enjoy the gratefully accepted winter fuel payment,would it be too much to ask you to favourably consider granting senior citizens a monthly allowance of cheaper fuel,say twenty pence a litre in the form of vouchers.
The vouchers could bear the necessary information relating to the entitled vehicle owner on presentation of the drivers'photocard licence and / or other documenation.
One monthly fill would enable us to visit our families without having to worry about the high cost at present levels.
Thank you.
Dennis Reynolds.
